species.name: Vaquita
species.info: The vaquita is a critically endangered species of porpoise endemic to the northern Gulf of California in Mexico.

species.name: Yangtze Finless Porpoise
species.info: The Yangtze finless porpoise is a critically endangered freshwater porpoise found only in the Yangtze River in China.

species.name: Saola
species.info: The saola, also known as the Asian unicorn, is a critically endangered antelope-like species found in the forests of Vietnam and Laos.

species.name: Harlequin Frog
species.info: Harlequin frogs are a group of critically endangered frog species found in the Andes Mountains of South America, known for their bright colors and patterns.

species.name: Gooty Tarantula
species.info: The Gooty tarantula, also known as the peacock tarantula, is a critically endangered species of spider found only in a small area of India.
